dcterms:description: The HH-RLFH dataset comprises 118k helpful and 42k harmless examples for training, and 8.5k for testing. It is used to train reward models for aligning language models with human preferences.
dcterms:title: HH-RLFH dataset

dcterms:description: COIG is a dataset used for training language models, details on its specific content are not provided in the paper.
dcterms:title: COIG

dcterms:description: LLaMA 2 is a dataset that includes open foundation and fine-tuned chat models, used for training language models.
dcterms:title: LLaMA 2

dcterms:description: A proprietary dataset used for training language models, specific details are not provided in the paper.
